title: Mastering Java: From Beginner to Expert
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Java is a versatile and powerful programming language widely used in enterprise applications, Android development, and server-side solutions. This book covers everything from core syntax and object-oriented programming to advanced concepts like multithreading, design patterns, and performance optimization. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, you'll gain practical skills to write clean, maintainable, and efficient Java code.
